name: Birds Of Paradise Tropical
description: Puerto Vallarta, one of Mexico’s most beautiful bays, located between the Pacific Ocean and the Sierra Madre Mountain, is home of exotic species and ecosystems. And the best way to discover everything that Vallarta has to offer is to take one of the tours into the jungle, where you can become one with nature and explore the wild life that hides just miles outside the city. In Eco tours you will be able to watch exotic birds, snorkel with rainbow colored fishes and adventure into the rapids, everything in order to get the ultimate adventure experience.
